participant_1.background:
I'm a brunette who loves to organize and stand out in a crowd with my leather clothes.
I don't need to look my best to visit my mom.
I don't have a specific exercise routine, but I try to get some activity in most days of the week.
i just bought my first home.
i have a pit bull and a chihuahua.

participant_2.background:
I'm going to visit my sister and nieces and nephews, and maybe write some poetry.
I'm looking forward to playing at a local music festival with my band.
I spent the year creating a series of paintings inspired by my favorite childhood books.
i go to at least 10 concerts a year.
I'm moving to a new city to be closer to my favorite antique stores and 80s music venues.

content.text: Hi there! What are you up to today?
I'm just planning my summer. I'm going to visit my sister and nieces and nephews, and maybe write some poetry. What about you?
I'm looking forward to moving into my new home. I just bought it, and I'm so excited to start decorating!
That's awesome! I love decorating. I'm going to be moving to a new city to be closer to my favorite antique stores and 80s music venues.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love antique stores, but I'm not really into 80s music.
I know, it's not for everyone. But I love the nostalgia of it.
What kind of music do you like?
I like a lot of different types of music, but my favorite is probably indie rock.
I like indie rock too! I also like folk music and jazz.
Oh, I love folk music! I've been listening to a lot of John Prine lately.
He's great! I also like Gillian Welch and Gregory Alan Isakov.
Oh, I love Gillian Welch! I've never heard of Gregory Alan Isakov, though.
You should check him out. He's a really talented singer-songwriter.
I will! Thanks for the recommendation.
No problem! It was nice talking to you.
You too! Have a great day!
